publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2473 Stuart McMillan: East Dunbartonshire’s Elite Performers—That the Parliament congratulates the 11 local athletes who have been supported by East Dunbartonshire Council’s 2008 Elite Performer Support Programme; notes that grants totalling £7,250 this year will assist young athletes in East Dunbartonshire who have a chance of reaching the London Olympics in 2012, and further acknowledges the commitment of East Dunbartonshire Council in awarding £10,000 per year until 2011 to support the best in their sports in East Dunbartonshire. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bashir Ahmad*, Alasdair Allan*, David Whitton*
S3M-2473 East Dunbartonshire’s Elite Performers (lodged on 2 September 2008) Bill Kidd*, Jamie Hepburn*, Sandra White*

S3M-2473 Stuart McMillan: East Dunbartonshire’s Elite Performers—That the Parliament congratulates the 11 local athletes who have been supported by East Dunbartonshire Council’s 2008 Elite Performer Support Programme; notes that grants totalling £7,250 this year will assist young athletes in East Dunbartonshire who have a chance of reaching the London Olympics in 2012, and further acknowledges the commitment of East Dunbartonshire Council in awarding £10,000 per year until 2011 to support the best in their sports in East Dunbartonshire. Supported by: Bob Doris, Jamie McGrigor, Bashir Ahmad, Alasdair Allan, David Whitton, Bill Kidd, Jamie Hepburn, Sandra White
